building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.blac: Die Schmiede rüstet Eure Armee mit Ballisten aus.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.capi: Das Kapitol bringt einen Ertrag von 4000 Goldstücken pro Tag.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.cast: Das Schloss fügt der Verteidigung der Stadt zwei Geschützturme und eine Mauer hinzu und verdoppelt das Wachstum der Kreaturen.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.cita: Die Zitadelle fügt der Verteidigung einer Stadt einen Geschützturm und erhöht das Wachstum der Kreaturen um 50%.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.city: Das Stadtrathaus ermöglicht Euch, Stadtausbauten zu kaufen und bringt einen Ertrag von 2000 Goldstücken pro Tag.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.dwel: The Cultivation of Cucumbers allows you to recruite Cucumbers.
Cultivation of Cucumbers
The Cultivation of Onions allows you to recruite Onions.
Cultivation of Onions
The Cultivation of Eggplants allows you to recruite Eggplants.
Cultivation of Eggplants
The Cultivation of Pumpkins allows you to recruite Pumpkins.
Cultivation of Pumpkins
The Cultivation of Broccoli allows you to recruite Broccoli.
Cultivation of Broccoli
The Cultivation of Potatoes allows you to recruite Potatoes.
Cultivation of Potatoes
The Parlor allows you to recruite Cossack Cucumbers.
Parlor
The Glass Dojo allows you to recruite Samurai Onions.
Glass Dojo
The Menhir allows you to recruite Wild Eggplants.
Menhir
The Field of Doom allows you to recruite Pumpkinheads.
Field of Doom
The Palace allows you to recruite Broccoli Lords.
Palace
The Castle allows you to recruite Noble Potatoes.
Castle
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.fort: Das Fort beschützt Eure Stadt mit defensiven Mauern.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.grai: The presence of the Ever-growing Bean increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day and grants additional attack to all Greenhouse vegetables.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.hord: The Ensilage increases Cucumbers production by 5 per week.
The Ensilage increases Cossack Cucumbers production by 5 per week.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.leg1: The Cultivation of Peas allows you to recruite Peas.
The Peas Barracks allow you to recruite Tyrolean peas.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.mage: Die Magiergilde erlaubt Euren Helden, die darin aufbewahrten Zaubersprüche zu lernen.
Die Magiergilde erlaubt Euren Helden, die darin aufbewahrten Zaubersprüche zu lernen.
Die Magiergilde erlaubt Euren Helden, die darin aufbewahrten Zaubersprüche zu lernen.
Die Magiergilde erlaubt Euren Helden, die darin aufbewahrten Zaubersprüche zu lernen.
Die Magiergilde erlaubt Euren Helden, die darin aufbewahrten Zaubersprüche zu lernen.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.mark: Hier könnt Ihr Ressourcen kaufen und verkaufen (der Wechselkurs steigt mit jedem Marktplatz, den Ihr besitzt).
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.reso: Das Rohstoff-Silo versorgt euch mit +1 Erz zusätzlich pro Tag.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.ship: In der Werft könnt Ihr Schiffe kaufen.
In der Werft könnt Ihr Schiffe kaufen.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.spec: Composters allows a visiting hero to sell creatures for resources.
Enables player to recruit once per week random creatures from flagged dwellings.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.tave: Die Taverne steigert die Moral der Truppen, die die Stadt verteidigen.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.town: Das Kreisrathaus ermöglicht Euch, Stadtausbauten zu kaufen und bringt einen Ertrag von 1000 Goldstücken pro Tag.
building.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.vill: Das Dorfrathaus ermöglicht Euch, Stadtausbauten zu kaufen und bringt einen Ertrag von 500 Goldstücken pro Tag.
faction.greenhouse-town.glasshouse.name: Greenhouse
hero.greenhouse-town.beata.name: Beata
hero.greenhouse-town.beata.specialty.des:
{Armorer}

Receives a 5% per level bonus to Armorer skill percentage.
hero.greenhouse-town.bogdan.biography: Sir Bogdan był niegdyś generałem w Erathiańskiej armii, ale zdezerterował i został ogrodnikiem i nauczył swoich nowych podopiecznych sztuki wojennej. Teraz sieje spustoszenie w wśród Niewarzyw.
hero.greenhouse-town.bogdan.name: Sir Bogdan
hero.greenhouse-town.bogdan.specialty.de:
{Ballista}

Ballista in his army is much powerful
hero.greenhouse-town.bonio.name: Bonio
hero.greenhouse-town.bonio.specialty.des:
{Diplomacy}

Receives a 5% per level bonus to Diplomacy skill percentage.
hero.greenhouse-town.chilia.name: Chili
hero.greenhouse-town.chilia.specialty.de:
{Drover}

Increase movement all units from Greenhouse by +1
hero.greenhouse-town.chilia.specialty.to: Increase movement by+1 for all units from Greenhouse.
hero.greenhouse-town.ching chang chong.s:
{Onions and Samurai Onion}

Increases Speed of any Onions or Samurai Onion by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 3 levels (rounded up).
hero.greenhouse-town.esmeralda.name: Esmeralda
hero.greenhouse-town.esmeralda.specialty:
{Sorcery}

Receives a 5% per level bonus to Sorcery skill percentage.
hero.greenhouse-town.gerta.name: Gerta
hero.greenhouse-town.gerta.specialty.des:
{Fireball}

Casts Firebal with damage increased by 3% for every n hero levels (n - target creature level).
hero.greenhouse-town.guba guba.name: Guba Guba
hero.greenhouse-town.guba guba.specialty:
{Eggplants and Wild Eggplants}

Increases Speed of any Eggplants or Wild Eggplants by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 4 levels (rounded up).
hero.greenhouse-town.jacquouille.name: Jacquouille
hero.greenhouse-town.jacquouille.special:
{Lightning Bolt}

Casts Lightning Bolt with damage increased by 5% for every n hero levels (n - target creature level).
hero.greenhouse-town.kalafiosteain.name: Cauliflowerstein
hero.greenhouse-town.kalafiosteain.speci:
{Broccoli and Broccoli Lord}

Increases Speed of any Broccoli or Broccoli Lord by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 6 levels (rounded up).
hero.greenhouse-town.kozak.name: Cossack
hero.greenhouse-town.kozak.specialty.des:
{Cucumbers and Cossack Cucumbers}

Increases Speed of any Cucumbers or Cossack Cucumbers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 2 levels (rounded up).
hero.greenhouse-town.litte smile.name: Litte smile
hero.greenhouse-town.litte smile.special:
{Peas and Tyrolean peas}

Increases Speed of any Peas or Tyrolean peas by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every level (rounded up).
hero.greenhouse-town.margret.name: Margret
hero.greenhouse-town.margret.specialty.d:
{Logistics}

Receives a 5% per level bonus to Logistics skill percentage.
hero.greenhouse-town.nicolai.biography: Nicolai pamięta czasy sprzed roztopów. Szalejące zimno i trzaskający mróz to ówczesna codzienność Vori, do której nigdy nie zdążył przywyknąć. Dlatego też jak tylko zabrano Miecz Mrozu i nastała wiosna to był najszczęśliwszym człowiekiem pod Słońcem. Szybko odnalazł się w roli Rolnika, a uprawę ziemniaków umiłował najbardziej..
hero.greenhouse-town.nicolai.name: Farmer Nicolai
hero.greenhouse-town.nicolai.specialty.d:
{ Potatoes and Noble potatoes}

Increases Speed of any Potatoes or Noble potatoes by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 7 levels (rounded up).
hero.greenhouse-town.petra.name: Petra
hero.greenhouse-town.petra.specialty.des:
{First Aid}

Receives a 5% per level bonus to First Aid skill percentage.
hero.greenhouse-town.sam Pchajplug.name: Sam Pchajplug
hero.greenhouse-town.sam Pchajplug.speci:
{Gold}

Increases kingdom's income by 350 gold per day.
hero.greenhouse-town.stonkososoczek.name: DragonJuice
hero.greenhouse-town.stonkososoczek.spec:
{Pumpkins and Pumpkinheads}

Increases Speed of any Pumpkins or Pumpkinheads by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 5 levels (rounded up).
hero.greenhouse-town.zozia.name: Zuzia
